description.p: This command stops one BGP session. If the session was in ESTABLISHED state, a CLOSE BGP message is sent to the corresponding neighbor. The session is then set in the IDLE state.
Note that if BGP messages need to be exchanged, they will be put into the simulator's queue. You will need to issue a sim runsim_run to process them.

see-also.p: To establish a session, use command bgp router X peer downbgp_router_peer_down.
